projects.General_content: Know how to create websites and fluently use support libraries

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.content: JavaScript is a programming language used by developers to create interactive websites. From refreshing social media feeds to displaying interactive maps and animations, JavaScript capabilities can improve a website's user experience. As a client-side scripting language, JavaScript is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web. For example, when browsing the internet, whenever you see an image carousel, a click-to-display drop-down menu, or dynamically changing element colors on a web page, that's when you see the effects of JavaScript. .
projects.General_content: Know how to create a website for yourself

projects.name: PHP1
projects.content: In the past, web pages were static, similar to the pages in a book. A static page mainly displays information in a fixed layout and does not do everything we would expect from a modern website. JavaScript is gradually becoming known as a browser-side technology to make web applications more flexible. Using JavaScript, browsers can respond to user interactions and change the layout of content on a web page.
